Title: Sin Say Shun Awards Afterparty
Plot: The Party Down team caters a porn awards afterparty. Kyle tries to teach Roman to "play it cool" with the porn stars. A mysterious businessman makes Ron a surprising business offer.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Offensive language,drug use and sexual themes
GuestStars: Mather Zickel, Ken Jeong, Beth Dover, Michele Nordin, Jeffrey Vincent Parise, Stormy Daniels, Diana Terranova
